verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to Egypt <WH4714> for help <WH5833>; and stay <WH8172> <WH8735> on horses <WH5483>, and trust <WH982> <WH8799> in chariots <WH7393>, because they are many <WH7227>; and in horsemen <WH6571>, because they are very <WH3966> strong <WH6105> <WH8804>; but they look <WH8159> <WH8804> not unto HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, neither seek <WH1875> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> !

Yet he also is wise <WH2450>, and will bring <WH935> <WH8686> evil <WH7451>, and will not call back <WH5493> <WH8689> his words <WH1697>: but will arise <WH6965> <WH8804> against the house <WH1004> of the evildoers <WH7489> <WH8688>, and against the help <WH5833> of them that work <WH6466> <WH8802> iniquity <WH205>.

Now the Egyptians <WH4714> are men <WH120>, and not 'Elohim <WH410>; and their horses <WH5483> flesh <WH1320>, and not spirit <WH7307>. When the YY <WH3068> shall stretch out <WH5186> <WH8686> his hand <WH3027>, both he that helpeth <WH5826> <WH8802> shall fall <WH3782> <WH8804>, and he that is holpen <WH5826> <WH8803> shall fall down <WH5307> <WH8804>, and they all shall fail <WH3615> <WH8799> together <WH3162>.

For thus hath the YY <WH3068> spoken <WH559> <WH8804> unto me, Like as the lion <WH738> and the young lion <WH3715> roaring <WH1897> <WH8799> on his prey <WH2964>, when a multitude <WH4393> of shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> is called forth <WH7121> <WH8735> against him, he will not be afraid <WH2865> <WH8735> of their voice <WH6963>, nor abase <WH6031> <WH8799> himself for the noise <WH1995> of them: so shall the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> come down <WH3381> <WH8799> to fight <WH6633> <WH8800> for mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726>, and for the hill <WH1389> thereof.

As birds <WH6833> flying <WH5774> <WH8802>, so will the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> defend <WH1598> <WH8686> Yerushalayim <WH3389>; defending <WH1598> <WH8800> also he will deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> it; and passing over <WH6452> <WH8800> he will preserve <WH4422> <WH8689> it.
Turn <WH7725> <WH8798> ye unto him from whom the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> have deeply <WH6009> <WH8689> revolted <WH5627>.

For in that day <WH3117> every man <WH376> shall cast away <WH3988> <WH8799> his idols <WH457> of silver <WH3701>, and his idols <WH457> of gold <WH2091>, which your own hands <WH3027> have made <WH6213> <WH8804> unto you for a sin <WH2399>.

Then shall the Ashurn <WH804> fall <WH5307> <WH8804> with the sword <WH2719>, not of a mighty man <WH376>; and the sword <WH2719>, not of a mean man <WH120>, shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> him: but he shall flee <WH5127> <WH8804> from <WH6440> the sword <WH2719>, and his young men <WH970> shall be discomfited <WH4522>.

And he shall pass over <WH5674> <WH8799> to his strong hold <WH5553> for fear <WH4032>, and his princes <WH8269> shall be afraid <WH2865> <WH8804> of the ensign <WH5251>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, whose fire <WH217> is in TZiyon <WH6726>, and his furnace <WH8574> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>.
